Package general.commands.builders.interfaces

Interface CommandBuilder

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
DataCommandBuilder, IdSetterCommandBuilder, ServerNeededCommandBuilder
All Known Implementing Classes:
ClearCommandBuilder, CountLessTypeCommandBuilder, ExecuteScriptCommandBuilder, ExitCommandBuilder, FilterContainsNameCommandBuilder, FilterFullNameCommandBuilder, HelpCommandBuilder, InfoCommandBuilder, InsertCommandBuilder, RemoveCommandBuilder, RemoveGreaterCommandBuilder, RemoveGreaterIdCommandBuilder, RemoveLowerCommandBuilder, ShowCommandBuilder, UpdateCommandBuilder
public interface CommandBuilder extends Serializable
Interface of command builder. Allow to set description for command.
Since:
1.0
Author:
safarislava
